SELECT team_info.enabled, team_info.teamId, team_info.teamName, team_info.modifyTime, team_info.logo, team_info.userId, team_info.companyId, team_info.createTime, team_info.areaId, a.`name` userName, b.areaName, c.companyName, (select IF(count(1) > 0, 1, 0) from pkg_userservice s where s.serviceId = 1002 and s.teamId = team_info.teamId and s.endTime >= now()) textPopularize, (select IF(count(1) > 0, 1, 0) from pkg_userservice s where s.serviceId = 1003 and s.teamId = team_info.teamId and s.endTime >= now()) videoPopularize FROM team_info LEFT JOIN pub_company c on team_info.companyId = c.companyId, sys_userinfo a, pub_area b WHERE team_info.userId = a.userId and team_info.areaId = b.areaId <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND team_info.enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if teamName?exists && teamName != ""> AND team_info.teamName = :teamName </#if> <#if modifyTime?exists && modifyTime != ""> AND team_info.modifyTime = :modifyTime </#if> <#if logo?exists && logo != ""> AND team_info.logo = :logo </#if> <#if companyId?exists && companyId != ""> AND team_info.companyId = :companyId </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND team_info.createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if areaId?exists && areaId != ""> AND team_info.areaId = :areaId </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND team_info.teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND team_info.userId = :userId </#if> <#if userName?exists && userName != ""> AND a.`name` like "%":userName"%" </#if> <#if areaName?exists && areaName != ""> AND b.areaName like "%":areaName"%" </#if> <#if companyName?exists && companyName != ""> AND c.companyName like "%":companyName"%" </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT enabled, teamId, teamName, modifyTime, logo, userId, companyId, createTime, areaId, (select IFNULL(a.shortName,'未设') from pub_area a where a.areaId = t.areaId) areaName, (select IFNULL(c.companyName,'未设') from pub_company c where c.companyId = t.companyId) companyName FROM `team_info` t where t.teamId != :teamId <#if areaId?exists && areaId != ""> and t.areaId = :areaId </#if> <#if teamName?exists && teamName != ""> and t.teamName like "%":teamName"%" </#if> <#if businessId?exists && businessId != ""> and t.companyId in (SELECT c.companyId FROM `pub_company` c where c.businessId = :businessId) </#if> <#if queryConditionCourt?exists && queryConditionCourt != ""> and t.teamId in (${queryConditionCourt}) </#if> <#if queryConditionTime?exists && queryConditionTime != ""> and t.teamId in (${queryConditionTime}) </#if> <#if queryConditionNumber?exists && queryConditionNumber != ""> and t.teamId in (${queryConditionNumber}) </#if> <#if competitionTime?exists && competitionTime != "" && competitionTimeEnd?exists && competitionTimeEnd != ""> and t.teamId not in (select u.teamId from court_zoneuse u where u.beginTime >= :competitionTime and u.endTime <= :competitionTimeEnd) </#if> <#if contract?exists && contract == 1> and t.teamId in (select p.teamId from pkg_userpackage p where p.teamId is not null) </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT enabled, teamId, teamName, modifyTime, logo, userId, companyId, createTime, areaId, (select IFNULL(a.`name`,'未设') from sys_userinfo a where a.userId = team_info.userId) userName, (select IFNULL(a.shortName,'未设') from pub_area a where a.areaId = team_info.areaId) areaName, (select IFNULL(c.companyName,'未设') from pub_company c where c.companyId = team_info.companyId) companyName FROM team_info where enabled = 1 and userId = (select p.userId from pkg_userpackage p where p.packageType = 1 order by p.createTime desc limit 1)

SELECT enabled, teamId, teamName, modifyTime, logo, userId, companyId, createTime, areaId, (select IFNULL(a.`name`,'未设') from sys_userinfo a where a.userId = team_info.userId) userName, (select IFNULL(a.shortName,'未设') from pub_area a where a.areaId = team_info.areaId) areaName, (select IFNULL(c.companyName,'未设') from pub_company c where c.companyId = team_info.companyId) companyName, (SELECT count(1) FROM `competition_info` t where t.initiateUserId = team_info.userId) initiatorNum, (SELECT count(1) FROM `competition_info` t where t.challengerUserId = team_info.userId) challengerNum FROM team_info where enabled = 1 order by 13 desc , 14 desc limit ${num}
